src:
Kalah dari Bournemouth, Mental MU Diklaim Tidak Terganggu
07 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek Manchester United, Ashley Young mengomentari kekalahan timnya dari Bournemouth baru-baru ini. Young mengatakan bahwa kekalahan itu tidak mengganggu mentalitas yang dimiliki timnya.
Sejak dua minggu lalu, Manchester United tengah membangun momentum yang bagus. Mereka berhasil meraih tiga kemenangan beruntun setelah mereka meraih banyak hasil negatif di awal musim ini.
Namun tren positif itu resmi terputus di akhir pekan lalu. Setan Merah harus tumbang di tangan Bournemouth dengan skor tipis 1-0.
Young menegaskan bahwa mental timnya tidak terusik akibat kekalahan itu. "Kekalahan tersebut tidak menyurutkan semangat kami," beber Young kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
Losing from Bournemouth, Mental MU Claimed Uninterrupted
Nov 7 2019, 18:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United defender Ashley Young commented on his team's recent defeat to Bournemouth. Young said that defeat did not interfere with the mentality of his team.
Since two weeks ago, Manchester United has been building good momentum. They managed to win three consecutive wins after they achieved a lot of negative results at the start of this season.
But the positive trend was officially broken at the end of last week. Red Devils must fall in the hands of Bournemouth with a thin score of 1-0.
Young insisted that his team's mentality was not disturbed by the defeat. "The defeat did not dampen our spirits," Young told the official Manchester United website.

Read the full defender's comments below.
